meanings.definition: An antiretroviral drug used to treat HIV infection.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed didanosine to help fight the HIV virus.
meanings.sent2: Patients with HIV often take didanosine as part of their treatment.
meanings.sent3: When the HIV virus saw didanosine coming, it knew its days were numbered.
meanings.sent4: Didanosine is like a brave soldier battling the HIV enemy within the body.
meanings.sent5: The bottle of didanosine shimmered with hope for the patient.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a medication used to manage HIV/AIDS.
meanings.sent1: Didanosine is an important medication in the fight against HIV/AIDS.
meanings.sent2: Pharmacists may recommend didanosine to help control the progression of the disease.
meanings.sent3: The HIV virus whispered to its friends, 'Watch out for didanosine, it's trouble.'
meanings.sent4: In the battle against HIV/AIDS, didanosine is a powerful weapon in the arsenal.
meanings.sent5: The word 'didanosine' echoed through the hospital halls, symbolizing hope for many.
